content: Magnus Carlsen is known as one of the biggest chess talents that ever lived. He became a grandmaster at the age of 13 years, 4 months, and 27 days. He has won numerous tournaments and has been the world's number one player continuously since 2011.
translations: ita:Magnus Carlsen è conosciuto come uno dei più grandi talenti scacchistici mai vissuti. Divenne un grande maestro all'età
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
